#include<bits/stdc++.h>
typedef long long ll;
 
ll power(ll a,ll b,ll c){
	if(b==0)
	return 1;
	
	ll x = power(a,b/2,c)%c;
	x = (x * x)%c;
	
	if(b&1) 
	x = (x * a)%c;
	return x%c;
}

int main(){

int t;
ll n,k;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--){
scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&k);
printf("%lld\n",power(n,k,10)%10);
}
return 0;
}
